page.title: 20Clubs & Societies in Burford
page.content: Burford & District is rich in its number of clubs & socities.These include Horticultural Assoc.,Guild of Arts,Flower Club,Cosy Club,W.I.,Camera Club,Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides,Post- Card Club,Burford Orchestra & Singers, Golf,Bowls,Football,Tennis,Cricket & Badminton Clubs.Homing Society,Youth Club,Young Farmers',Concert & Theatre Club,Children's Dancing Class,Burford Hospital Comforts Fund,Refugee Aid Gp. British Sailors' Society,Fire Servoce Social Club,Women's Bright Hour,Women's Fellowship,Peace Group,Bible Study Gp. Bell Ringers' Guild,Choir,Charity Trustees,Burford,Upton & Signet Welfare Trust,Fox's Holwell Welfare Trust and Burford & District Society.
